column1:
Framing: 

We recommend this Hotel A because your stay there helps create local jobs, promote sustainable growth, support eco-friendly practices and keep the local spirit alive. It’s your way to help build a brighter, more sustainable future for both travelers and the communities you visit!Untitled Question
column2:
Simplification:
We recommend Hotel A because it has a higher sustainability score (9 out of 10). This simple indicator lets you identify at a glance the most planet-friendly option.
column3:
Increase salience of attributes:
We recommend Hotel A because of its features:
🌱 Local breakfast – fresh and eco-friendly!
🤝 Locally managed – your stay supports the community!
☀️ Solar-powered – clean energy across operations!
column4:
Make external information visible:
We recommend Hotel A because it directly supports global sustainability goals. By choosing Hotel A, you contribute to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals:
SDG 7 –  Affordable & Clean Energy: through using renewable energy sources
SDG 8 –  Decent Work & Economic Growth: through job creation for local residents
column5:
Framing:

We recommend Backpack A because by choosing it, you’re actively shrinking your carbon footprint and championing more responsible production. This backpack is your personal contribution to climate action. Take pride in traveling lighter on the planet, one backpack at a time!
